Text:
You will see the two boxes with locks
These boxes are linked with the same set of videos
However, one box opens at the same delay (3 seconds) while other opens at a variable delay (1,3,6 seconds).

Open the locks to see a video
You can choose freely which locks to open

Click on the lock you want to unlock

Wait until a lock has disappeared before you click on another lock

You cannot change your mind about which box you want to open once you've clicked on a lock
You've completed the first block of 4 of the experiment. Please take a break and proceed when you're ready.

You will see two boxes with locks
These boxes are linked with two different types of videos.

Open the locks to see a video
You can choose freely which locks to open

Click on the lock you want to unlock

Wait until a lock has disappeared before you click on another lock

You cannot change your mind about which video you want to choose once you've clicked on a lock
You've completed the second of 4 blocks. Please take a break and proceed when you're ready.

You will see two boxes with locks
One box has videos of people while other has videos of household objects

Open the locks to see a video
You can choose freely which locks to open

Click on the lock you want to unlock

Wait until a lock has disappeared before you click on another lock

You cannot change your mind about which video you want to choose once you've clicked on a lock
You've completed the third of 4 blocks. You will now have 6 questionnaires to complete. Please proceed when you're ready.
